full_summary:
### Furniture Tender for 4th Floor, East Memorial Building

The Government of Canada is issuing an Invitation to Tender for the provision of office furniture to the Department of Justice Canada located in the East Memorial Building, 284 Wellington Street, Ottawa, Ontario.

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Name and Reference Number**: Furniture 4th Floor - East Memorial Building - 284 Wellington Street, Ottawa, ON (ref: cb-710-44059129)
* **Publication and Closing Date**: [2024-04-30][2024-05-17]
* **Expected Contract Duration**: 9 months (July 2024 - March 2025)
* **Location**: 284 Wellington Street, 4th Floor, Ottawa, ON
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive and selective tendering
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture, including:

* Accommodation furniture
* Furniture
* Office furniture
* Modular furniture connectors

#### Tender Requirements

* The tenderer must be a registered supplier in the General Stream of Suppliers (SA holders)
* Tenderers are expected to provide a comprehensive response to the RFP, including a detailed proposal, a bid, and a fulfillment plan
* Tenderers must demonstrate experience in providing furniture procurement services to government departments

#### Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Lowest cost
* Technical capability
* Past experience
* Expertise

#### Contact Person

For more information, contact:

* Shaun Revill
* Procurement Specialist
* Department of Justice Canada
* Phone: (343) 597-4079
* Email: [shaun.revill@justice.gc.ca](mailto:shaun.revill@justice.gc.ca)
